title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
notes: Game is currently in beta until 18SEP2018.  As of right now, the day the 2nd beta hit, it loads and runs fine.  Performance is definitely playable.  Did not require any winetricks or xact fixes, loaded up just like it should.  I Played single-player only (local game), since multiplayer connections were refused due to EAC "sandbox" detected (Proton/Wine): https://pasteboard.co/HBCCReP.png

title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
notes: Perfomance is bad, averaging at 20-30 fps with all settings low and 70% screen rendering. Tested only Local play vs bots since Matchmaking kicks from server possibly due to anti-cheat error
specs: Intel© Core™ i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz × 4 / NVIDIA Corporation GM204 [GeForce GTX 970]

title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
notes: DX11 feature level 10.0 is required to run the engine.'

title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
notes: overall 10 FPS less. Longer loading times.

title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
notes:
Only works for local play because EAC fails to validate in multiplayer. Needed workaround in launch options: PROTON_USE_WINED3D11 %command% 
Otherwise, the game will fail to launch because it needs "Directx11 level 10"

title: Insurgency: Sandstorm Beta 2
notes: Local and co-op gameplay works. Anti cheat fails to launch for multiplayer. So joining public lobbies can be an issue. Frame rates also jump around from 25 fps to 80 fps.
the game runs, and seems stable in the menus, but i get kicked (due to anti cheat) when trying to join a server
